A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I want my money back.
I was promised a Star Wars movie\, but I didn't get to see one.
Our galaxy is endlessly big\, yet they managed to find the worst possible director and writer for this project.
A big\, stinking middle finger to all the care and hard work that J.J. Abrams put into this.
If we ever discover backwards time travel\, undoing this movie is the first thing that humans will try to fix.
